summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2003 ROLLS RITE TRAILER, MODEL NUMBER 25KP25HD. THE CONTACT WAS DRIVING 55 MPH WHEN THE PULL RING FAILED AND DETACHED FROM THE TRAILER.  THE TRAILER WAS TOWED TO A SERVICE YARD FOR INSPECTION. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED WHO PROVIDED NO ASSISTANCE. THE TRAILER DID NOT RECORD MILEAGE.
